title: CityFibre offers businesses free connections to replace Government’s Connection Voucher scheme (CityFibre Infrastructure Holdings plc) ...
text: ( Source : CityFibre Infrastructure Holdings plc) London , 20th October 2015 - CityFibre has responded to the sudden suspension of the government's Super Connected Cities connection voucher scheme, by offering businesses free connection to its
